lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic hopes that his "great passion for tennis" will finally earn him the one trophy he craves more than any other -- the French Open.
snippet: Novak Djokovic hopes that his "great passion for tennis" will finally earn him the one trophy he craves more than any other -- the French Open....

headline.main: Djokovic Back in Paris to Mend His Broken Heart
